column4: Microsoft to sell feature phone business to Foxconn subsidiary  HMD Global
column5: Microsoft Corp  said it is selling its entry-level feature phone assets to FIH Mobile Ltd and HMD Global Oy for $350 million.

column4: Tesla plans to sell $1.7 billion in new stock to fund Model 3
column5: DETROIT/SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Motors Inc  will offer up to $1.7 billion of new common stock to finance the accelerated launch of its new Model 3 electric sedan  the electric luxury car maker said on Wednesday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla plans to sell $1.7 bln in new stock to fund Model 3
column5: DETROIT/SAN FRANCISCO  May 18 Tesla Motors Inc  will offer up to $1.7 billion of new common stock to finance the accelerated launch of its new Model 3 electric sedan  the electric luxury car maker said on Wednesday.

column4: Tesla plans $2 billion stock offering to finance quicker Model 3 launch
column5: May 18 Tesla Motors Inc said it would sell $2 billion of stock to help finance the accelerated launch of its new Model 3 electric sedan.

column4: Tesla Motors plans to raise $2 bln for Model 3
column5: May 18 Tesla Motors Inc said it expected to raise about $2 billion through a stock offering to "accelerate the ramp" of its first mass-market car  the Model 3.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla raising money to accelerate ramp of Model 3 via $2 bln offering
